name: latin-editor
description: An editor to ease the understanding of texts written in classical Latin.
author: G.C. Marty

scripts.generate-icons: inkscape -e src/favicon.ico -w 32 src/img/icon.svg;inkscape -e src/icons/32.png -w 32 src/img/icon.svg;inkscape -e src/icons/192.png -w 192 src/img/icon.svg;inkscape -e src/icons/512.png -w 512 src/img/icon.svg;
